name: BridgeNoise
description:
Global Game Jam 2018 Entry.

https://globalgamejam.org/2018/games/bridgenoise

Liz is a programmer who came to Global Game Jam at Noisebridge with purpose: to make a game! By herself.

When the aliens of her imaginary game  planet turn out to be real, they transmit clues to Liz that lead the player through a click through puzzle adventure that cause her to find out what the Aliens are really like and the dangers of trying to go at life alone.
